query:
SELECT source, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(rating), 2) as avg_rating 
FROM guestReviews 
GROUP BY source 
ORDER BY count DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user c2qSkVB4gKtEmor.991468648419 --database 4ExKc24KNHdr4pKbTUzsoU --execute SELECT source, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(rating), 2) as avg_rating 
FROM guestReviews 
GROUP BY source 
ORDER BY count DESC
